name: Catgirl Care (Demo)
description:
In this short, free visual novel teaser, you take care of a catgirl named Rain!

The final game, Catgirl Care will not be anything like this game, so consider this a little teaser for the project as I get it started. If you'd like to help me make the 3D catgirl care or just want to keep up to date on the progress, join the development discord! https://discord.gg/Jqnkejk

Consider supporting my work on Patreon!
